feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 10:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers and flurries near midnight then to flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
